headline: Why is Visa Inc. (V) One of the Best Stocks to Buy in 2026 for Beginners?
summary: Visa Inc. (NYSE:V) is one of the best stocks to buy in 2026 for beginners. On January 13, Citi reaffirmed a Buy rating on Visa Inc. (NYSE:V) and set a price target of $450.00. headline: Why US retailers want new swipe fee legislation
summary: US retail groups are urging lawmakers to reform credit card swipe fees, saying dominant networks limit merchant choice.
